name: FaithManchester
0:
”Alexa, open Faith Manchester”
”Alexa, ask Faith Manchester for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Faith Manchester”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: faith manchester
des:
Listen to the latest episode of the Faith in Manchester podcast - Christians in action in Greater Manchester, UK. Hosted by Wayne Clarke.
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're finished for the day. 
When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
